item.title: 特朗普威胁就乌克兰问题对俄罗斯实施新的银行业制裁
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他正在 "强烈考虑 "就俄罗斯对乌克兰的持续攻击对其实施新的银行业制裁和关税，从而在结束冲突的预期谈判之前加大压力。【原文：President Donald Trump said he’s “strongly considering” fresh banking sanctions and tariffs on Russia over its continued attacks on Ukraine, ramping up pressure ahead of expected negotiations to end the conflict.】

item.title: 南非内阁支持小幅上调增值税
item.description: 据熟悉讨论情况的人士透露，南非内阁将支持提高增值税，以换取国家财政部承诺审查支出和加快经济增长。【原文：South Africa’s cabinet will back a value-added tax increase in exchange for a commitment from the National Treasury to review spending and fast-track economic growth, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 特朗普再次批评南非政策，南非兰特下跌
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普再次批评南非之后，南非兰特走软。【原文：South Africa’s rand weakened after US President Donald Trump renewed his criticism of the country.】

item.title: 二月份美国就业报告的主要启示
item.description: 以下是周五公布的 2 月份美国就业报告的五大要点。单击此处查看我们的 TOPLive 博客：【原文：Here are five key takeaways from the US employment report for February, released Friday. Click here for our TOPLive blog:】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行为首席执行官邦纳费留任至 2028 年铺平道路
item.description: 法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）正寻求延长其首席执行官的董事会任期，并提高该职位的年龄限制，此举将为让-洛朗-邦纳费（Jean-Laurent Bonnafe）延长欧洲大型银行中最长的任期之一铺平道路。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is seeking to extend the board mandate of its chief executive officer and raise the age limit for the role, moves that would pave the way for Jean-Laurent Bonnafe to extend one of the longest tenures at a large European bank.】

item.title: 联合国维和人员和南苏丹士兵在撤离任务中丧生
item.description: 联合国南苏丹维和特派团的一名工作人员和南苏丹人民国防军的几名成员在该国北部的一次疏散演习中丧生。【原文：One person working with the United Nations peace-keeping mission to South Sudan and several members of the South Sudan People’s Defense Forces were killed during an evacuation exercise in the north of the country.】

item.title: 二月份劳动力市场数据疲软，国债延续涨势
item.description: 月度就业报告显示出疲软迹象，交易商对美联储今年晚些时候降息的预期未变，美国国债上涨，延续了2025年的涨势。【原文：US Treasuries rose, adding to their 2025 gains, after the monthly jobs report showed signs of weakness, leaving intact traders’ expectations for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts later this year.】

item.title: 花旗银行因 2022 年 "胖手指 "闪崩事件被瑞士交易所监管机构罚款
item.description: 2022 年，一名伦敦员工的肥胖手指交易导致欧洲股市闪崩，花旗集团因此被瑞士证券交易所监管机构罚款 50 万瑞士法郎（约合 56.8 万美元）。【原文：Citigroup Inc. was fined 500,000 Swiss francs ($568,000) by Switzerland’s stock exchange regulator for failures after a London staffer’s fat-finger trade caused a flash crash in European stocks in 2022.】

item.title: 高盛分析师在欧洲通信卫星组织大幅反弹后调转评级
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analysts raised their rating on Eutelsat Communications SA shares to neutral less than two weeks after adopting a sell stance that would have missed the stock’s meteoric rise.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战和制裁紧紧抓住本已紧张的重油市场
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易战和制裁正在收紧重质原油市场，推高了稠油的价格，并提高了美国最大炼油中心的成本。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade wars and sanctions are tightening the market for heavy crude, boosting prices for the sludgy oil and raising costs for the largest American refining center.】

item.title: 卡扎克说：由于不确定性，欧洲央行需要对四月减息持开放态度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，由于经济前景取决于难以预测的地缘政治冲击，欧洲中央银行应在下个月的利率决策中保留所有选项。【原文：The European Central Bank should keep all options on the table for next month’s decision on interest rates as the economic outlook hinges on geopolitical shocks that are hard to predict, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 美国招聘步伐稳健，失业率意外上升
item.description: 美国 2 月份的招聘情况依然坚挺，失业率有所上升，表明在经济不确定性上升的情况下，劳动力市场正在逐步降温。【原文：US hiring remained firm in February and the unemployment rate edged higher, illustrating a labor market that’s cooling only gradually in the face of rising economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 加拿大就业市场在连续数月强劲增长后陷入停滞
item.description: 加拿大的就业市场在经历了数月的稳定增长后出人意料地得到了喘息，但由于找工作的人减少，失业率保持稳定。【原文：Canada's job market unexpectedly took a breather after months of steady growth, but the unemployment rate held steady as fewer people looked for work.】

item.title: 纳斯达克加入寻求提供全天候交易的交易所行列
item.description: 纳斯达克公司（Nasdaq Inc. ）计划在其股票交易所提供 24 小时交易，这是纳斯达克寻求利用全球对美股日益增长的需求的最新举措。【原文：Nasdaq Inc. plans to offer 24-hour trading on its equities exchange, the latest venue seeking to capitalize on growing global demand for US stocks.】

item.title: 纽蒙特扩大与金矿业竞争对手的产量差距
item.description: 最大的金矿企业正在争夺金银市场的主导地位。纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp. ）由于在 2023 年收购了澳大利亚纽克雷斯特矿业公司（Newcrest Mining Ltd. ）而增加了产量，去年扩大了其第一大生产商的地位。与此同时，巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.如果巴里克在马里的矿山综合体今年继续关闭，阿尼科-伊格尔公司有可能超越其更大的竞争对手。【原文：The biggest gold miners are jostling for dominance over the bullion market. Newmont Corp. expanded its position as the top producer last year thanks to added output from its 2023 takeover of Australia’s Newcrest Mining Ltd. Meanwhile, Barrick Gold Corp.’s lead over Agnico Eagle Mines Ltd. narrowed after production fell due to operational setbacks. Agnico Eagle threatens to overtake its bigger rival if Barrick’s mine complex in Mali remains closed this year.】

item.title: 马斯克的 "星链"（Starlink）Wi-Fi 将出现在您附近的美联航飞机上
item.description: 美国联合航空公司控股公司（United Airlines Holdings Inc.【原文：United Airlines Holdings Inc. installed its first Starlink terminal on a regional aircraft, becoming the first major US airline to adopt Elon Musk’s satellite connectivity service for in-flight Wi-Fi.】

item.title: 美国能源部长计划寻求 200 亿美元以补充石油储备
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯-赖特（Chris Wright）计划寻求高达 200 亿美元的资金，以实现唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的目标，将美国枯竭的石油储备重新填充到最大容量。【原文：US Energy Secretary Chris Wright plans to seek up to $20 billion to accomplish President Donald Trump’s goal of refilling the nation’s depleted oil reserve to its maximum capacity.】

item.title: 据说阿布扎比正考虑在人工智能热潮中重启 AIQ 股票出售计划
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司和数据分析公司Presight AI Holding Plc就可能恢复其人工智能合资企业上市计划举行了早期会谈。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s state oil firm and data analytics company Presight AI Holding Plc have held early-stage talks about potentially reviving plans to list their artificial intelligence joint venture, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国 2 月份就业报告分析
肯尼亚总统鲁托与奥廷加联手巩固政权
item.description: 肯尼亚总统威廉-鲁托（William Ruto）周五与反对党领导人拉伊拉-奥廷加（Raila Odinga）签署了一项权力分享协议。【原文：Kenyan President William Ruto signed a power-sharing agreement with opposition leader Raila Odinga on Friday, months after deadly anti-government protests shook the nation.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险在 BBVA 交易竞标中扩大萨瓦德尔股份
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团（Zurich Insurance Group AG）在萨瓦德尔银行（Banco Sabadell SA）积累了大量股份，有可能使其对一个面临恶意收购的重要销售来源产生更大的影响。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG has amassed a substantial stake in Banco Sabadell SA, potentially giving it more influence over an important source of sales that’s facing a hostile takeover bid.】

item.title: 智利总统候选人伊夫林-马特埃公布竞选蓝图
item.description: 智利中右翼总统候选人伊夫琳-马特伊（Evelyn Matthei）在 11 月大选前公布了竞选优先事项，承诺打击犯罪和非法移民，同时实现经济翻番增长。【原文：Chilean center-right presidential candidate Evelyn Matthei pledged to crack down on crime and illegal immigration, while doubling economic growth, as she unveiled campaign priorities ahead of the November election.】

item.title: 利用伪造的新加坡总理照片推销加密货币和居留计划
item.description: 新加坡领导人周五表示，新加坡总理黄遵宪的 "深度伪造 "照片正在网上流传，并被用于销售加密货币、赚钱计划和永久居留权申请服务。【原文：Deepfakes of Singapore Prime Minister Lawrence Wong are circulating online and being used to sell cryptocurrency, money-making schemes and permanent residency application services, the country’s leader said on Friday.】

item.title: 贝森特警告经济将进入 "排毒期"，吹捧特朗普的 "呼吁
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特警告说，随着特朗普政府将经济增长的基础从政府转向私营部门，美国经济可能会出现一些混乱。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent warned that the US economy may see some disruption as the Trump administration shifts the basis for growth away from the government and toward the private sector.】

item.title: 欧洲通信卫星公司惊人的市场涨幅令做空者手忙脚乱
item.description: 上周五，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在椭圆形办公室与乌克兰总统发生了激烈冲突，这让基金经理雨果-斯奎尔（Hugo Squire）相信是时候购买欧洲通信卫星公司（Eutelsat Communications SA）的债券了。【原文：It was US President Donald Trump’s furious Oval Office clash with his Ukrainian counterpart last Friday that convinced fund manager Hugo Squire it was time to buy bonds in Eutelsat Communications SA.】
